Places\/locations.description: ib qho kev sau ntawm qhov chaw

Places\/location.description: Sawv cev rau lub tsev, qhov chaw, nkoj, chaw ua si, thiab lwm yam.

Places\/area.description: Sawv cev rau thaj tsam hauv ib qho chaw, xws li chav tsev lossis chav suite

Places\/floor.description: Sawv cev hauv pem teb hauv ib lub tsev lossis lub nkoj

Places\/nearby.description: Qeb rau cov khoom nyob rau hauv ib qho kev ncua deb ntawm geohash

Places\/interest.description: Qeb rau tej yam nyob rau hauv ib tug tej yam deb ntawm ib tug geohash, txuam ib tug txaus siab
